title: Luna & Carlos Wedding

heroMedia.alt: Luna and Carlos wedding ceremony at sunset

description: A cinematic celebration of love at a historic hacienda, blending traditional Mexican elements with modern elegance.
challenges: Coordinating multiple vendors across a sprawling venue while capturing intimate moments in challenging lighting conditions.
solution: We implemented a comprehensive logistics timeline and deployed specialized low-light equipment for seamless coverage.
results: Full ceremony edit completed in 2 weeks

seo.title: Luna & Carlos Wedding - Cinematic Coverage | Cuarto Rojo
seo.description: Professional wedding videography and photography at Hacienda San José. See how we captured this magical Mexican celebration.

title: TechCorp Annual Summit

heroMedia.alt: TechCorp summit main stage with dynamic lighting

description: A high-stakes corporate summit requiring flawless execution and multi-platform distribution.
challenges: Live streaming to 5000+ remote attendees while managing complex AV setups across multiple breakout rooms.
solution: Deployed redundant streaming infrastructure and coordinated seamless transitions between 8 concurrent sessions.

seo.title: TechCorp Annual Summit - Corporate Event Production | Cuarto Rojo
seo.description: Professional corporate event coverage and live streaming for TechCorp's annual summit in Mexico City.

title: Artisan Food Festival

heroMedia.alt: Beautifully styled artisan dishes at food festival

description: Showcasing Mexico's finest artisan foods through compelling visual storytelling and meticulous styling.
challenges: Styling and photographing perishable foods in outdoor conditions while maintaining freshness and appeal.
solution: Developed a mobile styling station with climate control and rapid-fire photography techniques.

seo.title: Artisan Food Festival - Food Styling & Photography | Cuarto Rojo
seo.description: Professional food styling and photography for Mexico's premier artisan food festival in Coyoacán.
